A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the worst Star Wars movie to date.  Completely breaks all established lore and world building within the Star Wars canon.  Characters have bad dialogue - REALLY bad dialogue.  Kind of writing that makes you roll your eyes constantly.  Its a shame\, since the Force Awakens really wasn't that bad.  What a horrible way to send off Luke\, Han\, and now Leia.  Get your act together Disney and Lucasfilm.
